snippet.title: Journey Launch Trailer I Coming July 21 I PS4 Exclusive
snippet.description:
On July 21, Journey will descend on the PlayStation 4 more stunningly beautiful than ever.  If you have yet to discover its wonders, or desire to soar above the ruins and glide across the sands once again, this is the perfect time. Additionally, Journey will support Cross-Buy. If you have digitally purchased it already for PlayStation 3, you can download it free for PlayStation 4.

Visit #OurJourney Experience: http://journey.playstation.com
Learn More About The Game: http://bit.ly/1H4924a

Follow thatgamecompany: http://www.twitter.com/thatgamecompany
Follow Sony Santa Monica: http://www.twitter.com/SonySantaMonica

"PlayStation" and the "PS" Family logo are registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. PS3 is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. © 2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Journey is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by thatgamecompany.
